description: When exploiting this vulnerability with CVE-2021â€“26858, an SSRF attack is used to manipulate virtual directories Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: ProxyLogon Reset Virtual Directories Based On IIS Log
query: ((http.request.method:"POST" AND http.response.status_code:"200" AND cs-uri-stem:"\/ecp\/DDI\/DDIService.svc\/SetObject" AND cs-uri-query:*schema\=Reset* AND cs-uri-query:*VirtualDirectory* AND cs-username:*$) OR (*POST* AND *200* AND *\/ecp\/DDI\/DDIService.svc\/SetObject* AND *schema\=Reset* AND *VirtualDirectory* AND *$*))
